Programme de developpement du syst�me
            statistique national : Evaluation d'impact sur l'environnement

abstracts.cdata!:
This is an environmental assessment of
            the Development of the National Statistical System Project,
            which builds the capacity of the national statistical
            systems of Burkina Faso by strengthening statistical
            methods, operations, analysis, and dissemination. It
            outlines anticipated negative environmental impacts and
            discusses measures to mitigate them. There will be no social
            impact from the project since it does not require that any
            population be displaced from land. Negative environmental
            impacts are expected from dust, noise, and increased traffic
            by heavy trucks during construction. Mitigation actions will
            include watering construction materials to reduce spreading
            of dust; organizing the work schedule for transporting
            materials and works outside of normal rush hours to minimize
            noisy interference with residential areas during their rest
            periods and late into the evening, as well as to reduce
            traffic congestion; using septic tanks for liquid waste
            disposal; and complying the governmental decrees regarding
            the handling of environmental impacts during construction.
